title: Not Just Snacks
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indian food menu with several veg suitable dishes including vegetarian curries, a thali, samosas, pakoras, aloo palak (potatoes and spinach), and mulligatawny soup. Dairy is used, so vegans to inquire. Aug 2013 reported has added vegan and gluten free items to its menu.
